Package model.ball

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IInteractStrategy
    Strategy that defines a directed interaction between two balls where the balls are NOT equivalently processed.
    IUpdateStrategy
    Interface for strategies that updates a ball's properties.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlternateSizeStrategy
    Strategy that causes the ball to change its alternate its size whenever it enters a collision.
    AUpdateStrategy
    Abstract class for update strategies
    Ball
    Abstract representation of a ball.
    BreathingStrategy
    Updates a ball's radius as if it is breathing.
    CollideStrategy
    Update strategy that causes balls to interact with each other upon collision
    ColorChangerStrategy
    ColorChangerStrategy creates a new ball whose InteractStrategy is to
    ColorCollideStrategy
    Strategy that causes the ball to change its color whenever it enters a collision.
    ColorStrategy
    Update the color of the ball to a random color.
    CurveStrategy
    Updates the velocity direction of the ball so that it runs in a curved path.
    KillStrategy
    Update strategy that causes the ball to "kill" a target ball upon collision
    MultiInteractStrategy
    Composite class to combine IInteractStrategies.
    MultiStrategy
    Strategy that combines multiple strategies.
    StraightStrategy
    A strategy that makes a ball go in straight lines.
    SwitcherStrategy
    This strategy lets a ball change its strategy from one kind to another.
    WanderingStrategy
    A strategy that has the ball wander around the screen in a random fashion.
